title: New: Green Eyes – The Things I Often Do
content: Yet more subtle crooner pop from New York, Green Eyes impressed with his debut track, the melancholic murmur of Dusk on the 5th, and has now returned with the 60’s swing of The Things I Often Do. So it’s far from being everyones cup of tea, it’s rough edged, verging upon monumentally cliched and lacking ‘a hook’ as such, but there’s something rather adorable to the twang of Green Eyes vocal and the unaltered, classical guitar. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
